about_the_game:
Zugalu Entertainment Official Game-jam Games:

These titles were voted Best in Show by gamers during our Game Jam events.
What are Game Jams? Game Jams are events where our developers race against the clock in a short time span (24-48 hours) to build a game from scratch to near completion. Although these events are solely for the fun and love of gaming, and these titles are not a feature release from Zugalu, we do take the titles that the community liked and after some extra love, release them so others may enjoy them as well!

No new features are in active development for these titles, but if you do come across any bugs or issues, please let us know and we will fix them. Contact us at: support@zugalu.com or on discord

Technolites is an action packed top down shooter with an epic animated adventure, fully voice acted. The first game in the genre to allow you to build your own ship, with dozens of unique parts and weapons.

FEATURES

- Build your own ship, and then equip it with your favorite weapons and upgrades.
- Enjoy fully-voiced, animated cut-scenes with a galactic story.
- Choose your difficulty: Start with Easy for beginners. Amp up the difficulty for a true retro adventure!
- Level up your characters to improve your ship they way you want.
- Challenge friends on the endless level and see how you hold up in the world with online leader boards.

name: Technolites: Episode 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and up
  • Processor: dual core 3ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1gb GPU
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: quad core 2ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia 1030 2gb
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated

short_description: Technolites is an action packed top down shooter with an epic animated adventure, fully voice acted. The first game in the genre to allow you to build your own ship, with dozens of unique parts and weapons.
